pros:

cons:

review_title: Spiritually & morally fulfilling but toxic workplace
pros: very enriching to work with passionate people who care for the homeless community and do a good job at it. spiritually very filling to celebrate your faith during work the lives of the people this organization helped is really noteworthy
cons: Not all people in the company are there for the right reasons. Hence some leaders or managers have questionable values and are just a hindrance to the growth and success of their employees. Gossip are all time high even your manager can backstab you. Its sad that all the negativity in the workplace hinders the true mission of the organization.

review_title: Toxic environment..from management and ft staff
job_title: Community Support Worker in Winnipeg, MB
pros:
I was able to get employment insurance after being harassed by managent and the clique full time staff
If you're not part of their group .prepare to be bullied yelled at and belittled. Human resources doesnt do nothing about it. It actually makes it worse. You will lose hours if you go speak to anyone. It's a nightmare.
cons: Everything about this organization is fake, and they don't care about clients or staff. They gossip and bully staff they don't want there. They will blatantly ignore u in group conversations, and constantly critique your work.

pros: Fast paced environment and very kind workers

The compassionate and humanitarian organization that connects the community in order to help hardships and provide opportunities for change for those who are affected by poverty and homeless people in the community
cons: I am interested in working for your organization as a support worker and daily activities
pay was not great but there was free food
